10. She hit the bullseye, but at what cost?!

15. Thanks to the two-three people who made it to the end of this dump! When I'm not busy making questionable life choices on the internet, I've been pouring my soul into a little passion project - a psychological horror/moral choice simulator game. Just wanted to share that last week I concluded a closed beta test and I got very positive feedback from players. Next step is to do a public one via Steam, so keep an eye on that! If you are interested, please wishlist the game on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2719670/The_Milgram_Experiment/

You'll see a lot of Nanotyrranus memes over the next few days. There wasn't enough to do a pure Nanotyrranus dump, so... yeah.

I like this answer. I think it's the right one.
This is awesome
The Orthodox takes on Halloween have always been fucking hilarious to me.
I have to say that was a crafty decision.
Sparkling Homunculus will be my new band name.
This is how we survived and grew.
Pippin tax! Today's message from Pippin: (angry noises and bites after i accidentally hit a pinfeather while giving him scritches) ______ 1) Are you on the run to a safe place and passing through Arizona on your way to safer grounds? My apartment is open to you to crash at, and it is a safe space. Pippin and I will make you a meal and gladly share tea, wine, or mead with you. 2) Hey! Take your meds with a full glass of water, please. Do it for Pippin, or Space Mom, or better yet, do it for yourself. 3) Ĝefeloað wē. We will carry on. 4) all funds from the sales of items at these two links will be sent to support charities aiding to fight for Trans rights in the US (not just T-shirts!) https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74812801-all-conures-are-anarchists https://www.teepublic.com/t-shirt/74811778-whiptail-pride 5) Since multiple people have requested this over the last two weeks or so, my ko-fi is: https://ko-fi.com/codyandpippin 6) Pippin and I now have a discord: https://discord.gg/qadbfR9A

item.title: Color me surprised that the conservatives want to subtly reinstate a genocide!
item.description:
Saw this today. I can’t say I’m surprised, the government has tried to commit genocide via AIDS before. I’ve even posted about the AIDS Crisis two years ago. I’ve included a couple of images from one of those posts as well. . Link to News Post: http://youtube.com/post/Ugkxv5jOLI2hc5yv2yjiI4Kt8SBo4nCx_1_U?si=N8wi0P07qEXFARLD Unbiased Report to Factcheck: Trump Budget Ends All CDC HIV Prevention Programs, While Maintaining Care, Treatment, and PrEP | HIV+Hepatitis Policy Institute
The entire post was seven images long, so I stacked two of them at a time to shorten this one.
This is from one of my posts talking about how the AIDS Crisis was a deliberate genocide.
Understanding HIV/AIDS Pt. 1: https://imgur.com/gallery/part-1-of-understanding-fatal-virus-that-changed-world-forever-qFnjuLe The AIDS Crisis: A Tale of Two Worlds: https://imgur.com/gallery/aids-crisis-tale-of- two-worlds-where-one-world-celebrated-destruction-of-other-world-rAnN2bM Looking for ACT UP Protestors: https://imgur.com/gallery/act-up-was-extremely-significant-part-of-history-i-d-love-to-hear-part-if-you-don-t-mind-rYaXfPy Context to the AIDS Crisis for Youngins’: https://imgur.com/gallery/explaining-why-people-associated-aids-with-being-gay-hatred-president-reagan-reason-act-up-protests-what-aids-quilt-was-about-Qu4D2IF Understanding HIV/AIDS Pt. 2: https://imgur.com/gallery/part-2-of-understanding-fatal-virus-that-changed-world-forever-DzzkZMh The Imgur AIDS Memorial: https://imgur.com/gallery/several-imgurians-were-kind-enough-to-share-memories-of-loved-one-they-lost-to-aids-i-made-this-post-to-remember-them-bUJXIV6 Image Source: https://www.ucsf.edu/news/40-years-aids-sf
item.dc:creator: OlivetheNerd

item.title: Not a selfie, read below.
item.description: Hi Everyone! This is my sister (and me, but just ignore me). She’s amazing! She’s raising three kids, doing the best she can, and today is her birthday. Lately, life has been beating her up, but she wakes up every day determined not to stay down. She finds strength to care for others even when she needs that strength for her own life. She bright and shiny and special and lovely, but most of her recent days are dark. I don’t want anything, no money, no go-fund-me, no pizza. I would consider it a favor if you’d take a moment to upvote & wish her a happy birthday. ????? That’s it. It’s that easy. In these trying times, it would be lovely of you all to share a small kindness. Thank you!
item.dc:creator: HarryPotter918

item.title: 20 Nice and wholesome things to brighten your day, vol 124
item.description: Speaking of baby steps, I found that no matter how stuck I got, if I thought about it I could pour a glass of water and drink it.  Once I’d done that, I could brush my hair.  After that I could clean my teeth.  With those things done, it was like a reset button had been pressed, and I could try again with what I needed to do. Try it next time you get stuck. Let me know if it works for you too.

item.title: To boldly go and find memes
item.description:
Welcome to this dump of Star Trek: Lower Decks memes. Sometimes I make the memes themed, sometimes I don't. If you enjoy laughing without talking politics and escaping reality, you’ll love following this page!
I grew up with a major Trekkie for a dad, so I know lots more about star trek than the average person.
Did I want to know it? Not necessarily.
However, I get a lot of references this show makes and I love that
My my dad looooves TOS so I've seen it a bunch of times
Then I married a guy who lives TNG so now I've watched all of that. For the fifteen time. This is not a joke.
I was a kid when Voyager came out. So dazzled by Janeway at the time!
Watched DS9 again so I finally understood the story arc. The Ferengi episodes are my favorite, but I'm into comedy so that's the reason
But captain Kirk? I was gonna marry that guy! ( When I was 7)
Did not know SF existed until the movie
Had to watch that episode featuring these people again. Did not know what that one was about
Remember 3rd Rock from the Sun? The aliens wanted to destroy eartg because it was blocking their view? Same vibes.
Maybe? Definitely a huge community.
I mean, other Christmas music is fine to me
Totally forgot about this scene until I let my kids watch out
I'm probably Tendi but depressed lol
I take that back, I'm Shax
Loved this episode
Haha!
Ew

26 Imgur Creator Spotlight: @grbmaw draws these animals and fills them in using panels from comic books. So cool.
27 Man Tax: Jose McKenzie
“Many of life's failures are people who did not realize how close they were to success when they gave up.” - Thomas Edison I try to keep my posts "good vibe zones". So, instead of finding the one thing in here you don't like and commenting only on that, also comment about something you DID like. Balance the negativity. Love you long time. So, I made a discord server. It's a relaxed environment where you can take/donate memes to the cause, play trivia twice a week, chat about lots of topics or about nothing at all. We also have Jack Box game night and are setting up movie night! Very laid back/relaxed vibe. Come hang with us. https://discord.gg/AWFV7FT3RQ I'm also on the imgcat server for updates & fun: https://discord.gg/TpjD37jgJ9 ***Also if you miss abbiistabbii's discord community good news! Here's the new one https://discord.gg/NPStJGgARq - where everyone's reconnecting, shitposting, and hanging out again*** https://ko-fi.com/mememuseumcurator Unable to work and pretty destitute. Feel free to leave me a tip. Those that have, y'all are the bee's knees. You've helped me so much. ***Tag me if you see an artist/creator you like whose work isn't getting seen as much as it should be! Or if you are an artist/creator and want me to post something of yours, DM me!

item.title: Good luck with that dream
item.description: https://bsky.app/profile/anildash.com/post/3m6hmtumftk26 There was a chance with the lawsuit against google and the judge had initially signaled that google needs to be broken up. It never came to fruition, not sure if its related to the re election of discharge. Your issue with google isn’t that a competitor can’t pull the same search results (eh, kinda), it’s that google is in our lexicon. You can say google it and it rolls off the tongue. Bing et al don’t have the same firepower. Or I’m just a dumbass on the internet posting wildly incorrect theories. Either way, I forgot where I was going with this rant.

item.title: AI creativity has a hard limit
item.description: The investigation revealed a fundamental trade-off embedded in the architecture of large language models. For an AI response to be effective, the model must select words that have a high probability of fitting the context. For instance, if the prompt is “The cat sat on the…”, the word “mat” is a highly effective completion because it makes sense and is grammatically correct. However, because “mat” is the most statistically probable ending, it is also the least novel. It is entirely expected. Conversely, if the model were to select a word with a very low probability to increase novelty, the effectiveness would drop. Completing the sentence with “red wrench” or “growling cloud” would be highly unexpected and therefore novel, but it would likely be nonsensical and ineffective. Cropley determined that within the closed system of a large language model, novelty and effectiveness function as inversely related variables. As the system strives to be more effective by choosing probable words, it automatically becomes less novel. By expressing this relationship through a mathematical formula, the study identified a specific upper limit for AI creativity. Cropley modeled creativity as the product of effectiveness and novelty. Because these two factors work against each other in a probabilistic system, the maximum possible creativity score is mathematically capped at 0.25 on a scale of zero to one. -------------------- Full article: https://www.psypost.org/a-mathematical-ceiling-limits-generative-ai-to-amateur-level-creativity/
